casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Daniel LUNA 406P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Daniel Luna, for Luna, Daniel. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by Defendant-Appellant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
